name: Add rows in Google Sheets for new actions in Glide
description: Every time an action is done in your Glide, Make will create rows with information on the action in your Google Sheets. Here's the [table](https://docs.google.com/spreadsheets/d/1-m7-AZM0Kqqx3aEH-nlj-cJ7WdRpQEF0o2jjUAiZmGM/edit?usp=sharing) used in this scenario, make sure yours has got same columns. And here's the [Glide app](https://go.glideapps.com/join/showy-offer-9a2155) as an example on how to configure your app for this scenario.
